issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: Currently, HiveServer2 leader selection (used only by privilegesynchronizer now) is reuse /hiveserver2 parent znode which is already used for HiveServer2 service discovery. This interfere the service discovery. I'd like to switch to a different znode /hiveserver2-leader.
fields.summary: HiveServer2 leader selection shall use different zookeeper znode

comments.body: Also fix an issue HiveServer2 shutdown does not close the zookeeper connection.
